fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use 2 potions at night, but only use the one that benefits you the most.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your potions can heal and they can kill.
- You will choose 2 actions. Whichever one is best for you will be the one you do.
- Order of what is best: You living > an evil being saved > a Town member dying > nothing happening > a Town member being saved > an evil dying (worst outcome)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose (this can win while dead).
